backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization mixin, user profiles, network and transmission types, and query/update methods for profile access and signaling state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files, describing responsibilities of pages, components, and layout elements.
frontend/docs/droidstar-settings-referen: Documents the DroidStar behavior being replicated, including server list fetching, caching, UI population, and normalization rules.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-23-prev: Deployment-only promotion record for Version 23 with verification checklists covering authentication, connection flows, PTT, activity, settings, and compliance pages.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-30-prev: Deployment-only promotion record for Version 30 with attestation of no code changes and detailed verification checklists for all major app flows.
frontend/docs/publish-preview-to-product: Runbook detailing the verification and promotion steps required to publish the preview deployment to production without code changes.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, PWA manifest, and mounting the root React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest configuring app name, icons, theme colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with messaging and a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching, offline handling, and network-first fetch logic with exclusions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app routing setup, authentication-aware redirects, and layout composition using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary component that displays error details and allows retrying or clearing session.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main application layout with header, navigation, footer, and responsive mobile/desktop nav items using auth-aware visibility.
Displays a segmented audio level meter that updates based on microphone input using a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedFlo: Shows a fallback error screen for authenticated flows with retry and session-clear options.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Controls authenticated access, showing login prompts, error states, or loading states based on identity and actor initialization.
frontend/src/components/AutoGatewayStatu: Indicates whether automatic gateway configuration is active and displays the inferred preset type.
frontend/src/components/ColorAccentPanel: Wraps content in a console-style panel with optional styling variants.
Renders a compact page header with title, subtitle, variant styling, and optional icon.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceConn: Form for configuring Digital Voice connections, including DMR settings, servers, credentials, and auto-loaded presets.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceSave: Displays saved Digital Voice configuration details, highlighting missing fields and gateway status.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryBrowser: Provides a network directory browser with filtering, search, mode selection, and talkgroup selection, including favorites handling.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchConne: Displays a form for configuring and saving IAX/DVSwitch connection settings with preset handling and auto-prefill logic.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchSaved: Shows the user's saved IAX/DVSwitch configuration, masking sensitive fields and offering an edit option.
frontend/src/components/InstallAppAction: Renders an install button for the PWA and shows iOS-specific installation instructions when needed.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Manages login/logout via Internet Identity with error handling, retry, and session clearing.
frontend/src/components/NowHearingList.t: Displays a list of recent transmissions with metadata and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/PersonalDirector: Manages local-only personal directory entries with add, delete, and form UI using localStorage.
frontend/src/components/PostLoginInterst: Displays a full‑screen loading overlay while finalizing sign‑in.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Presents a required profile setup dialog for callsign, name, and license acknowledgement with validation.
frontend/src/components/PttControl.tsx: Implements a push‑to‑talk button with press/hold detection and transmit state callbacks.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeStatusBa: Shows connection, transmit, or receive status with dynamic icons and styling.
frontend/src/components/TransmitDisclaim: Warns users that license acknowledgement is required and links to settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Actor hook with logging, retry, and controlled query invalidation for error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioLevelMeter.ts: Tracks live microphone audio level using Web Audio API and returns normalized level and active state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile via the backend actor with retries and invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and toggle a user's favorite networks using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, loading, and managing user identities via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicPttRecorder.ts: Manages microphone push-to-talk recording, handling permissions, recording state, and returning a blob URL on completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworks.ts: Fetches builtin networks and performs simple client-side search filtering through React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useNowHearing.ts: Retrieves real-time transmissions with polling and provides a mutation to update activity data.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferredConnectio: Handles saving, loading, clearing, and validating user preferred connection configurations in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Detects PWA installability, handles install prompts, and identifies iOS/installed states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrzLookup.ts: Runs a QRZ callsign lookup via a backend actor method if available.
frontend/src/hooks/useRememberLoginPrefe: Manages a persisted 'remember login' user preference using localStorage.
Provides hooks for fetching, caching, and updating BrandMeister and AllStar server directories via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch the caller's user role and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRtcPtt.ts: Implements a WebRTC push-to-talk hook managing peer connection setup, media streams, signaling, and gateway integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles and OKLCH color variables for a radio console theme with custom utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutCompliancePage.t: Renders an informational page describing PTTStar, its creator, features, and licensing requirements.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: Displays live and recent transmission activity using auto-updating data and a refreshable activity feed.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Handles connection setup, presets, saved configurations, and quick setup flows for IAX and digital voice connections.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Provides a network and talkgroup browser with selection handling and navigation to PTT via saved directory-based connections.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the landing page with welcome info, setup requirements, and links for new users. Uses UI components and icons to present intro guidance for PTTStar.
frontend/src/pages/PttPage.tsx: Implements the main push-to-talk interface including WebRTC connection logic, audio level monitoring, and auto-connect behavior for BrandMeister DMR. Handles room setup, status display, and transmit controls.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides user profile editing, license acknowledgment, server directory configuration, and manual refresh actions. Loads and saves profile data and directory source URLs via hooks.
frontend/src/utils/digitalVoiceGatewayCl: Implements a WebRTC signaling client for Digital Voice gateways using WebSocket-based SDP and metadata exchange. Handles connection setup, message routing, and sending signaling messages.
frontend/src/utils/gatewayUrlBootstrap.t: Captures gateway-related URL parameters on load, stores them in sessionStorage, and infers connection presets. Provides helpers to read persisted parameters and track auto‑flow attempts.
frontend/src/utils/roomKey.ts: Generates stable room keys and human-readable room labels based on connection settings. Normalizes server addresses and handles multiple connection types.
frontend/src/utils/serverAddress.ts: Provides utilities to normalize and compare server or gateway addresses for consistent processing. Strips whitespace and applies lowercase normalization.
Provides localStorage-based caching for BrandMeister and AllStar server lists with TTL tracking and helpers to get, set, clear, and check cache age.
Fetches BrandMeister and AllStar server lists with timeout handling and parses text into server entry objects.
frontend/src/utils/serverDirectorySource: Manages storage and retrieval of GitHub source URLs and metadata for server directories, with defaults and reset functions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, spacing, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Describes app requirements and features focused on auto-connecting to BrandMeister and AllStar using predefined server lists without user-entered URLs.
